dhn_topology module¶

class dhn_topology.DHNTopology(dhn_graph: GraphDHNGenerator = None, graph_folder_name: str = 'Generated_DHN', heating_demand_model=2, dpe_model_demand_version=1, max_h=4, max_d=0.5, min_d=0.05)¶

Bases: object

This class contains the DHN graph generated, the topology information and the heating demands of the nodes

dhn_graph¶

the DHN graph generator. Defaults to None.

Type:

GraphDHNGenerator, optional

graph_folder_name¶

the folder name of the graph. Defaults to “Generated_DHN”.

Type:

str, optional

heating_demand_model¶

the heating demand model version to use. If 1 use heating law model, else if it is 2 use the DPE based model. Defaults to 2.

Type:

int, optional

dpe_model_demand_version¶

the DPE based model version to use, only used if the DPE based model is selected. Defaults to 1. Further information, refer to DPE model

Type:

int, optional

max_d¶

max diameter value of the pipes (m). Defaults to 0.5.

Type:

float, optional

min_d¶

min diameter value of the pipes (m). Defaults to 0.5.

Type:

float, optional

max_h¶

max convective coefficient of the pipes with minimum value 0.8. Defaults to 4.

Type:

float, optional

regenerate_heating_demands(model_demand_version: int = 2)¶

Regenerates the heating deùands if the heating model has been changed

Parameters:

model_demand_version (int, optional) – the new heating demand model version to use. Defaults to 2.

Returns:

None

SyntheticDHN
